sentences.sentence: Our acquaintanceships are accidental, perhaps this is by chance a predestination.
sentences.translation: 我们的相识是偶然的，也许这偶然是一场缘分。

sentences.sentence: Has needs the external cooperation processing the fellow old friends and new acquaintanceships, hoped sincerely you can give more faith and the support!
sentences.translation: 有需外协加工的各位旧雨新知，真诚希望您能给予更多的信赖和支持！

sentences.sentence: And of all my acquaintanceships the most intimate and, to tell the truth, the most a GREeable to me was my acquaintance with Luganovitch, the vice-president of the circuit court.
sentences.translation: 说实话，在我所结识的人中最亲密，最合我意的是跟巡回法庭的副庭长卢格·诺维奇的相识。
